author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

- This is part 2 of the PR for including L1 tracking to central CMSSW. (Code was split up into two PRs for the two packages, see initial closed PR: #29284 )
- Part 1 is in PR #29381 , it is required for this PR to compile. 
- The combined PR (part 1+2) implemented hybrid algorithm to be used for HL-LHC HLT TDR studies. 

#### PR validation:

- Code checks implemented following comments from earlier (closed) PR. 
- L1 tracking performance as expected.
title: Hybrid L1 tracking algorithm (tracklet part)
